Header.DisplayTitle: TfL | Step-Free Tube Guide with all Toilets-ELRAD

Header.FeedInfo: First version of ELRAD feed for developers

Attribution.TermsAndConditions: This feed is subject to TfL terms and conditions

SpecificEntrance.SpecificEntranceInstructions: You must use the correct entrance/exit depending on which platform you are travelling to and from as you cannot change step-free between platforms within the station. Use the Churchﬁeld Road entrance via the ticket hall for platform 2. Use the entrance on the other side of the level crossing for platform 1

You must use the correct entrance/exit depending on which platform you are travelling to and from as you cannot change step-free between platforms within the station. Use the Ridsdale Road entrance for platform 1. Use the Anerley Station Road entrance for platform 2

Accessibility.AdditionalAccessibilityInformation: You can only enter and exit platform 2 towards Crystal Palace and West Croydon

Line.DirectionTowards: Crystal Palace and Clapham Junction via Canada Water
Richmond and Clapham Junction via Willesden Junction
New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon
New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon
New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon

Accessibility.AdditionalAccessibilityInformation: The Circle line no longer runs in a continuous loop and you may have to change trains at Edgware Road to carry on with your journey.

SpecificEntrance.SpecificEntranceInstructions: Both platforms are accessible only to/from the main (Devonshire Road) northbound entrance

You must use the correct entrance/exit depending on which platform you are travelling to/from and you cannot change step-free between platforms. To access platform 1 use the Hepscott Road entrance. To access platform 2 use the Wallis Road entrance.

Line.DirectionTowards: New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon

SpecificEntrance.SpecificEntranceInstructions: You must use the correct entrance/exit depending on which platform you are travelling to and from as you cannot change step-free between platforms within the station. Both entrances are on Green Lanes

Accessibility.AdditionalAccessibilityInformation: You can change between fast, semi-fast and 'all stations' trains running in the same direction.
You can only enter and exit platform 2 towards Watford Junction
You can only enter and exit platform 2 towards Watford Junction using the side entrance on Headstone Lane
If you are travelling towards Central London, you need to board the ﬁfth carriage

Line.DirectionTowards: New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon

Accessibility.AdditionalAccessibilityInformation: You can only enter and exit platform 1 towards Richmond and Clapham Junction

PublicToilet.Location: In King's Cross National Rail station

Line.DirectionTowards: New Cross, Clapham Junction, Crystal Palace and West Croydon

SpecificEntrance.SpecificEntranceInstructions: You must use the correct entrance/ exit depending on which platform you are travelling to/from. To access platform 1 use the Kingswood Terrace entrance. To access platform 2 use the Palmerston Road entrance
You must use the correct entrance/exit depending on which platform you are travelling to/from. Use the Peak Hill Gardens entrance for platform 1. Use the Station Approach entrance for platform 2
You must use the correct entrance/ exit depending on which platform you are travelling to/from. Entrances to both platforms are on Holloway Road

PublicToilet.Location: In waiting area on platform 6, accessible toilet in ticket hal.
